TopicTitle: Whenever try opening up KSP on Ckan for version 1.0, it gets stuck on Verifying Expansion: Breaking Ground SquadExpansion/Serinity

Articles.Content:
I pressed alt-f12, and it says; "Exception: ReflectionTypeLoadException: Exception of the type 'System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException' was thrown.

[ModuleManager] Intercepted a ReflectionTypeLoadException. List of broken DLLs: B9PartSwitch 1.0.1.0 GameData/B9PartSwitch/Plugins/B9PartSwitch.dll"

I cannot remove b9 partswitch, since it is necessary to run b9 aerospace, which I want. Why is this happening?

Can you provide the log files please? They contain far more information than you’ll get in the in-game console. Here’s how to get them:
